title: Zar Trypa Cave Sanctuary
description: A cave sanctuary, dedicated to the Nymphs, located on the east side of Mount Ossa's western "Psila Dendra" ridge north of the modern village of Spilia. Epigraphic and other evidence indicates the sanctuary was active from the Classical through Roman periods.

properties.description: Location determined in Google Earth with reference to Blomley, Figure 13
properties.title: Approximate Imagery Location of Cave
